Package ihm.Components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomButton
    All button in this application should inherit from it
    Field
    This is the components that displays the simulation
    LabelList
    class which handles the display of some informations regarding the curent state of the field the class has two JLabel
    MagnifyingGlassButton
    Button that open a little window that zoom on a specific spot of the simulation
    MainFrame
    mother frame of the application also the entry point i.e the main method is here
    PlayPauseButton
    Button to play or pause the simulation
    QuitButton
    Button to quit the application
    RandomInitializationButton
    button that initialize the simulation with probabilities given by the user through dialog boxes
    ReinitializationButton
    the button to clear the field
    ResizePanel  
    ZoomFrame
    This Frame zooms on a specific spot of the simulation
    ZoomPanel
    This is panel where the zoomed spot on the field is rendered
